Issue.creator: ashutosh_kumar
Issue.summary: npm audit Prototype Pollution Vulnerability (lodash package)
Issue.description: restify > lodash │ mock-couch > restify > restify-errors > lodash ├───────────────┼──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤ │ More info │ https://nodesecurity.io/advisories/782 The proposed fix is : npm update lodash --depth 4 >
